title: 🔼EXPLORE YOUR OPTIONS IN SOUTH SHORE🔽 2BD $805 SEC 8 ACCEPTED
posting_body: ['ID: c7706sag', 'Explore Your Options in South Shore (60649) "Virtual and video tours available!', 'Visit our website to view videos of our available apartments or call now to schedule a virtual tour!', 'All you need is an internet connection."', 'Call 312-428-4861 Right', 'Now', '**NOTE**', 'If replying by email please remember to include your phone # and/or email address in your response so we can follow up with you directly.', '2 Bedroom $805 (650 sqft) -Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', 'Location:  Near Yates and E 79th St', 'Amenities: Dining Room, Eat-In Kitchen, Hardwood Floor, High-End Finishes', 'The building offers:  Laundry On-site, Parking (fee required), and Security Cameras', '7706 S Saginaw Ave is a five-minute walk from the ME Metra Electric at the Windsor Park stop.', 'This apartment is in the South Shore neighborhood in Chicago.', 'Nearby parks include Rainbow Park, Eckersall Stadium, and Eckersall Stadium.', '***Please note that photos are a representation of a model apartment and are not pictures of the actual unit.', '"Pangea is an Equal Housing Opportunity provider".', 'Call 312-428-4861 to schedule a tour!', '“Pangea Real Estate practices on-going dynamic pricing for all operated units.', 'Unit promotions, discounts, and monthly rent quotes are subject to change based on day of month, current inventory, and additional market factors.', ' As such, any promotions, discounts, or monthly rent quotes are valid only at the time presented to a prospective tenant and can expire anytime thereafter.”']
